INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Have the terms of engagement not yet been agreed?</p><i><p>If any of the following factors are relevant to this audit assignment, a new letter of engagement should be issued:</p><ul> <li>A recent change of senior management;</li> <li>A significant change in ownership; </li> <li>A change in the financial reporting framework adopted in the preparation of the financial statements; or</li> <li>A change in other reporting requirements.</li> </ul></i>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Has the A.E.P. or other key audit principals been in the role for 7 consecutive years <i>(for listed, PIE and other regulated companies? )</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Has a partner (including the engagement partner and engagement quality reviewer (EQR), joined the client in a key management position, and has less than two years elapsed since the end of the last audit that they worked on?</p><p><i>Careful consideration should be given as to whether this is the most appropriate course of action and clear reasoning given if the firm decides to continue in the engagement.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Will total recurring fees for client or where they are part of a group, the group exceed 10% of the gross practice income?</p><p><i>N.B. This limit is not established in the Code of Ethics issued by IESBA, but is recommended by a number of audit regulators worldwide. In the event that fees exceed this limit, it should be clearly documented why it is still appropriate for the firm to continue to act as auditor</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Are there fees outstanding which are substantially in excess of our normal credit terms?</p><p><i>N.B. If outstanding fees are in excess of normal credit terms, document the period in question.</i></p><p><i>Consideration should also be given to work in progress where billing has been deferred ~ document the amount and period in question.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Have the actual amount of the fees for the preceding audit, along with terms for the payment, not yet been agreed?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Have any contingent fee arrangements been agreed in respect of any services?</p><p><i>NB: Audit work cannot be undertaken on a contingent fee basis, neither can non-audit services if the contingent fee is material to the firm, or the outcome of the non-audit services is dependent upon a future audit judgment. Tax services cannot be undertaken on a contingent fee basis where the fee is dependent on the proposed application of tax law which is uncertain or has not been established</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Does the audit firm or any network firm act as company secretary or director for the audit client or associated undertaking?</p><p><i>NB: If the answer to this question is yes then no safeguard can be implemented which would enable the audit to be undertaken.</i></p><br>\r\n', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Does any partner or director of the audit firm or network firm act as company secretary or director to the company or associated undertaking, in either an official or unofficial capacity?</p><p><i>NB: If the answer to this question is yes then no safeguard can be implemented which would enable the audit to be undertaken.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Does a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) hold any shares or other beneficial interest in the client?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Is a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) a trustee of a trust that owns shares in the client?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Is there any loan or other financial arrangement between a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) and the client?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Does a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) purchase goods or services from the client in the ordinary course of business where the value of the purchase is material to either party?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Does a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) have close family or personal relationships with the client?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Are we aware of any conflicts of interest?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Are we involved in, or threatened with, any litigation with this client?</p><p><i>NB: Where this is the case the audit firm cannot accept the engagement.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Have we, or any other person who can influence the audit, accepted or been given gifts or hospitality by the client in excess of that acceptable under the firm’s criteria?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Are we acting for a parent undertaking of a group, preparing consolidated financial statements, where we only act for an insignificant proportion of the group?</p><p><i>NB: Where this is the case the audit firm should consider not accepting the engagement.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Is there any indication that the directors may impose a limitation of scope resulting in a disclaimer of opinion being issued on the financial statements (PSA 705.13(b)(i))?</p><p><i>NB: Where this is the case the audit firm cannot accept the engagement.</i></p><p><i>NB2: Where in preceding periods a disclaimer of opinion has been given arising from an imposed limitation of scope (irrespective of whether the firm acted as auditor for this period), directors’ written representations should be obtained that this situation will not arise again this year. </i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Are we lacking the technical expertise and support and other resources to undertake this engagement?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Has assessment of the integrity of the owners, directors and management given any cause for concern?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Has the firm provided any valuation services (including litigation support and actuarial services) for the client that prohibit the audit from being undertaken?</p>\r\n<p><i>NB: Valuation services can only be provided if they are immaterial to the financial statements or non subjective.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Has the firm provided any prohibited services to an entity that has recently been acquired by the audit client? </p><p><i>N.B. The firm has no more than three months after the effective date of an acquisition to eliminate threats which could impair independence.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Complete form Ac2 – Provision of Non-Audit Services to Audit Clients for all non-audit services to be provided by the firm, and any network firm to the audit client or any of its associated undertakings. Do any of these services affect our service as auditors of this client? </p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Do we know of any other factors that could affect independence or otherwise indicate that we should not accept this appointment?</p><p><i>For instance, this might include the situation where an individual who was employed by the client within the last two years has now joined the audit firm.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Based on an overall assessment of threats on an individual and cumulative basis, would an objective, reasonable and informed third party conclude that the firm’s integrity, objectivity or independence are compromised? If so, the firm shall not act as auditor.</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'eqr', '{\"eqr\":\"The A.E.P. deems it necessary for a review to be undertaken.\",\"eqr1\":\"N\\/A\",\"eqr2\":\"N\\/A\",\"eqrr\":\"N\\/A\",\"hcc\":\"I do\",\"iio\":\"can accept\"}', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '2', 'AC2', 'pans', '<p>Member of informed management designated to receive results of the service</p>', '', '', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '2', 'AC2', 'pans', '<p>Members of staff to be involved in non-audit service:</p>', '', '', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '2', 'AC2', 'pans', '<p>Partner who will oversee provision of non-audit service:</p>', '', '', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '2', 'AC2', 'pans', '<p>Fee (on an annual basis) for providing this non-audit service <strong>(a)</strong>:</p>', '', '', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '2', 'AC2', 'pans', '<p>Expected audit fee in respect of the current period <strong>(b)</strong>:</p>', '', '', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '2', 'AC2', 'pans', '<p>Multiple of total non-audit fees to audit fee <strong> (a/b) </strong> <i>(only required if total non-audit fees exceed audit fee)</i></p>', '', '', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '2', 'AC2', 'pans', '<p>Will the person performing the non-audit service or the partner responsible for this form part of the audit team?</p>', '', '', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '2', 'AC2', 'pans', '<p>Where the question above is answered ‘yes’ the necessary safeguards should be documented here. </p><p><i>These safeguards could include:<ul> <li>the non-audit service is reviewed by a partner or senior staff member with suitable expertise and who is not part of the audit team;</li> <li>the audit is subject to an EQR; or</li> <li>the staff involved in the non-audit service are sufficiently experienced and senior to mitigate the self review threat of the partner being responsible for both assignments.</li> </ul></i></p>', '', '', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '2', 'AC2', 'ac2aep', 'N/A', 'We will not provide other services as it is not possible to put sufficient safeguards in place and we wish to remain as auditor', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '15', 'AB1', 'ab1', '<p>Where exemptions are being applied, has it been ensured that the company is still eligible to take advantage of these (Appendix 1.4, Ab2)?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '15', 'AB1', 'ab1', '<p>Has other information in documents containing the audited financial statements, including the Directors’ Report (if applicable), been reviewed to ensure that it is consistent with the audited financial statements, prepared in accordance with applicable legal requirements and is it, to the best of the auditors’ knowledge, free from error (ISA 720.14)?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '15', 'AB1', 'ab1', '<p>Are references to the length of the accounting period correct (i.e. year or period ended)?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '15', 'AB1', 'ab1', '<p>Has the name of the company and the director(s) been spelt correctly throughout the annual report and does the company name agree exactly to that registered at our companies’ registry? </p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '15', 'AB1', 'ab1', '<p>Have the financial statements been cast?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '15', 'AB1', 'ab1', '<p>Are references to ‘Director(s)’ consistent with the number of directors?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '15', 'AB1', 'ab1', '<p>Are all pages numbered and are these in agreement with references given in the contents page and audit report?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '15', 'AB1', 'ab1', '<p>Have the corresponding amounts been checked?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '15', 'AB1', 'ab1', '<p>If corresponding amounts are unaudited, have they been annotated as such, and has an “Other Matter” paragraph been included in the audit report (ISA 710.14 / ISA 706.10 and 11)?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '15', 'AB1', 'ab1', '<p>Is the use of brackets correctly and consistently applied throughout the primary statements and notes?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '15', 'AB1', 'ab1', '<p>Does the Statement of Financial Position balance?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '15', 'AB1', 'ab1', '<p>Have items in the Statement of Financial Position and Performance Statement(s) been cross-referenced to the lead schedules?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '15', 'AB1', 'ab1', '<p>Does any additional ‘management information’ such as a detailed analysis of profit or loss (if applicable) agree to the information in the statutory section of the financial statements and has it been annotated, as <i>‘These pages do not form part of the audited financial statements’</i>?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '15', 'AB1', 'ab1', '<p>Do the note numbers agree to the Statement of Financial Position, Statement of Changes in Equity, Statement of Cash Flows and the Performance Statement(s) (where relevant) and are they consecutively numbered?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '15', 'AB1', 'ab1', '<p><i>(If applicable)</i> Has the Statement of Cash Flows (including notes) been cross referenced to the S section of the file?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '15', 'AB1', 'ab1', '<p>Does the detail in the notes agree to the primary statements?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '15', 'AB1', 'ab1', '<p><i>(If applicable)</i> Do the pages referred to in the audit report exclude the Directors’ Report and any ‘management information’?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '15', 'AB1', 'ab1', '<p>Does the Audit Report correctly refer to ‘profit’ or ‘loss’ or ‘results’ as applicable?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '15', 'AB1', 'ab1', '<p>Does the sign off on the Audit Report refer to, and include the name of the “Statutory Auditor”?</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '17', 'AB3', 'oldsection3', 'In relation to the company and its subsidiaries is there disclosure of: <ul> <li>Particulars of any important events which have occurred post balance sheet;</li> <li>An indication of likely future developments in the business; and</li> <li>An indication of any activities in the field of research and development?</li> </ul>', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '17', 'AB3', 'oldsection3', 'Where a company has acquired its own shares during the period, are the following disclosed: <ul> <li>The number and nominal value of shares purchased;</li> <li>The consideration paid;</li> <li>The reason for purchase; and</li> <li>Percentage of called-up share capital these shares represent?</li> </ul>', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '17', 'AB3', 'oldsection3', 'In respect of own share acquisitions other than purchases, or a lien or charge on these shares: <ul> <li>Number and nominal value of shares acquired or charged during the period;</li> <li>The maximum number and nominal value of such shares held at any time during the period;</li> <li>Number and nominal value of shares acquired or charged that were disposed of or cancelled during the period;</li> <li>In relation to the above, the amount of called-up share capital those shares represent; and</li> <li>The amount of any charge?</li> </ul>', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '17', 'AB3', 'oldsection3', 'Does the Directors\' Report state the date of approval by the Board and the names of the directors signing on their behalf?', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '17', 'AB3', 'checklist', '{\"y1\":\"Yes\",\"y2\":\"Yes\",\"y3\":\"No\",\"y4\":\"Yes\",\"y5\":\"Yes\",\"y6\":\"No\",\"y7\":\"No\",\"y8\":\"Yes\",\"y9\":\"Yes\",\"y10\":\"No\",\"y11\":\"No\",\"y12\":\"Yes\",\"y13\":\"Yes\",\"y14\":\"NA\",\"y15\":\"No\",\"y16\":\"No\"}', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '17', 'AB3', 'oldsection2', 'Is there a fair review of the development and performance of the business of the company and its subsidiaries during the financial period, a description of the principal risks and uncertainties facing the company and its subsidiaries, the position at the period-end and an analysis using financial key performance indicators? <p><b><i>N.B. It is usually possible to omit some disclosures as follows:-</i></b></p> <ul> <li><b><i>Disclosure of information about impending developments or matters in the course of negotiation if the disclosure would, in the opinion of the directors, be seriously prejudicial to the interests of the company; or</i></b></li> <li><b><i>(Disclosure of information about a person) the disclosure would, in the opinion of the directors, be seriously prejudicial to that person and contrary to public interest.</i></b></li> </ul>', '', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '17', 'AB3', 'oldsection2', '<b>Financial Instruments</b>', '', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c3` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '17', 'AB3', 'oldsection2', 'In relation to the use of financial instruments by a company, does the report disclose: <ul> <li>The financial risk management objectives and policies of the company, including the policy for hedging each major type of forecasted transaction for which hedge accounting is used; and</li> <li>The exposure of the company to price risk, credit risk, liquidity risk and cash flow risk?</li> </ul> <p>Unless this information is not material for the assessment of the assets, liabilities, financial position and profit or loss of the entity.</p> <p>NB: If full disclosure is given in the body of the financial statements, then it is acceptable to have a cross-reference to those disclosures.</p>', '', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Have the terms of engagement not yet been agreed?</p><i><p>If any of the following factors are relevant to this audit assignment, a new letter of engagement should be issued:</p><ul> <li>A recent change of senior management;</li> <li>A significant change in ownership; </li> <li>A change in the financial reporting framework adopted in the preparation of the financial statements; or</li> <li>A change in other reporting requirements.</li> </ul></i>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Has the A.E.P. or other key audit principals been in the role for 7 consecutive years <i>(for listed, PIE and other regulated companies? )</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Has a partner (including the engagement partner and engagement quality reviewer (EQR), joined the client in a key management position, and has less than two years elapsed since the end of the last audit that they worked on?</p><p><i>Careful consideration should be given as to whether this is the most appropriate course of action and clear reasoning given if the firm decides to continue in the engagement.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Will total recurring fees for client or where they are part of a group, the group exceed 10% of the gross practice income?</p><p><i>N.B. This limit is not established in the Code of Ethics issued by IESBA, but is recommended by a number of audit regulators worldwide. In the event that fees exceed this limit, it should be clearly documented why it is still appropriate for the firm to continue to act as auditor</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Are there fees outstanding which are substantially in excess of our normal credit terms?</p><p><i>N.B. If outstanding fees are in excess of normal credit terms, document the period in question.</i></p><p><i>Consideration should also be given to work in progress where billing has been deferred ~ document the amount and period in question.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Have the actual amount of the fees for the preceding audit, along with terms for the payment, not yet been agreed?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Have any contingent fee arrangements been agreed in respect of any services?</p><p><i>NB: Audit work cannot be undertaken on a contingent fee basis, neither can non-audit services if the contingent fee is material to the firm, or the outcome of the non-audit services is dependent upon a future audit judgment. Tax services cannot be undertaken on a contingent fee basis where the fee is dependent on the proposed application of tax law which is uncertain or has not been established</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Does the audit firm or any network firm act as company secretary or director for the audit client or associated undertaking?</p><p><i>NB: If the answer to this question is yes then no safeguard can be implemented which would enable the audit to be undertaken.</i></p><br>\r\n', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Does any partner or director of the audit firm or network firm act as company secretary or director to the company or associated undertaking, in either an official or unofficial capacity?</p><p><i>NB: If the answer to this question is yes then no safeguard can be implemented which would enable the audit to be undertaken.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Does a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) hold any shares or other beneficial interest in the client?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Is a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) a trustee of a trust that owns shares in the client?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Is there any loan or other financial arrangement between a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) and the client?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Does a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) purchase goods or services from the client in the ordinary course of business where the value of the purchase is material to either party?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Does a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) have close family or personal relationships with the client?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Are we aware of any conflicts of interest?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Are we involved in, or threatened with, any litigation with this client?</p><p><i>NB: Where this is the case the audit firm cannot accept the engagement.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Have we, or any other person who can influence the audit, accepted or been given gifts or hospitality by the client in excess of that acceptable under the firm’s criteria?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Are we acting for a parent undertaking of a group, preparing consolidated financial statements, where we only act for an insignificant proportion of the group?</p><p><i>NB: Where this is the case the audit firm should consider not accepting the engagement.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Is there any indication that the directors may impose a limitation of scope resulting in a disclaimer of opinion being issued on the financial statements (PSA 705.13(b)(i))?</p><p><i>NB: Where this is the case the audit firm cannot accept the engagement.</i></p><p><i>NB2: Where in preceding periods a disclaimer of opinion has been given arising from an imposed limitation of scope (irrespective of whether the firm acted as auditor for this period), directors’ written representations should be obtained that this situation will not arise again this year. </i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Are we lacking the technical expertise and support and other resources to undertake this engagement?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Has assessment of the integrity of the owners, directors and management given any cause for concern?</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Has the firm provided any valuation services (including litigation support and actuarial services) for the client that prohibit the audit from being undertaken?</p>\r\n<p><i>NB: Valuation services can only be provided if they are immaterial to the financial statements or non subjective.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Has the firm provided any prohibited services to an entity that has recently been acquired by the audit client? </p><p><i>N.B. The firm has no more than three months after the effective date of an acquisition to eliminate threats which could impair independence.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Complete form Ac2 – Provision of Non-Audit Services to Audit Clients for all non-audit services to be provided by the firm, and any network firm to the audit client or any of its associated undertakings. Do any of these services affect our service as auditors of this client? </p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Do we know of any other factors that could affect independence or otherwise indicate that we should not accept this appointment?</p><p><i>For instance, this might include the situation where an individual who was employed by the client within the last two years has now joined the audit firm.</i></p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '1', 'AC1', 'cacf', '<p>Based on an overall assessment of threats on an individual and cumulative basis, would an objective, reasonable and informed third party conclude that the firm’s integrity, objectivity or independence are compromised? If so, the firm shall not act as auditor.</p><br>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '2', 'AC2', 'pans', '<p>Will the person performing the non-audit service or the partner responsible for this form part of the audit team?</p>', '', '', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_client_c1` (`wpID`, `fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES (1, '1', '2', '2', 'AC2', 'pans', '<p>Where the question above is answered ‘yes’ the necessary safeguards should be documented here. </p><p><i>These safeguards could include:<ul> <li>the non-audit service is reviewed by a partner or senior staff member with suitable expertise and who is not part of the audit team;</li> <li>the audit is subject to an EQR; or</li> <li>the staff involved in the non-audit service are sufficiently experienced and senior to mitigate the self review threat of the partner being responsible for both assignments.</li> </ul></i></p>', '', '', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')

It is usually possible to omit some disclosures as follows:-</i></b></p> <ul> <li><b><i>Disclosure of information about impending developments or matters in the course of negotiation if the disclosure would, in the opinion of the directors, be seriously prejudicial to the interests of the company; or</i></b></li> <li><b><i>(Disclosure of information about a person) the disclosure would, in the opinion of the directors, be seriously prejudicial to that person and contrary to public interest.</i></b></li> </ul>', '', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Preparing', NULL, '2025-01-07 13:42:34')
